comment: Too political and uber obviously left wing.

Easy online class, 4 exams + final, and discussion posts. Pay attention to due dates and you are golden. Material is really really easy to review as long as you can teach it to yourself. I found myself forgetting about this class cause assignments were spread out far. (8wk course)
rating_tags: Test heavy--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: The good reviews for this course are either for another class, or are outdated for POLS 1101. There are 4 exams, the class is lecture heavy, and the tests are very misleading and you never know what is going to be covered. There are very specific trick questions on the exams that contradict each other. Professor is very full of himself.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I'm not sure how this professor has such a good rating. Grade is based off of 4 exams and an optional essay final. He doesn't actually teach and only offers outlines instead of actual material. Good luck knowing what's supposed to be covered on the exam, and he will not answer or clarify any questions. One of the worst professors I've ever had.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I have heard goo things about this professor, but please DO NOT TAKE if you are taking him online. He has no clue how to run and online class and we never meet. We doesn't add any assignment to the D2L calendar, so its a fun game of guess when the next assignment is due, at to top it off he take of 50 POINTS for one day late.
Dr. Swint is a great professor and an expert in his field. His directions and expectations for the class are super clear and he is approachable and helpful if you have any issues.
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: Do the work and you'll get an A. He's super passionate and experienced in the field and I loved his lectures. Very clear syllabus with a course calendar with all due dates posted. Discussion post every week relevant to current events. Take him if you get the chance!! One of the best professors I've ever taken at KSU.

A very decent class. Not a huge amount of work, but there is a 12 page paper at the end and a weekly discussion that really isnt bad at all. Tests are annoying though, they are very complex with multiple essays and he only gives you 24 hours to do them so sometimes that causes issues if you have other obligations. Other than that he is great!

Great class to take in an election year. Dr. Swint knows his stuff and has a good interactive style of teaching. The reviewer below must have been disappointed with their grade, because no one I talk to in that class felt that way at all. Gives you a choice of group project or individual research paper. Takes attendance.

Lots of lectures. He has a ton of experience in the field, which is a good thing but is also very annoying because even though he is trying to teach, its more like bragging and is not very interesting. Everything you learn in this class comes from the textbook.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Really good class, Dr. Swint is known around the country as an author and political expert, so it's cool to have him in the classroom. Class is one day a week. Good discussions, not much reading.

Swint is a great professor and great with explanations! You have 3 tests and they all come from his lectures-- prepare to write everything that comes out of his mouth bc it will be on the test! Study hard and you will do good! Definitely participate as much as you can in discussion and debates! Offers extra credit papers for every test!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: His online class was the best I've ever taken. Simple and to the point, but thorough. Only post response to discussion board, no response or reply to another post. 3 Tests, open book and straightforward. One paper of your topic choice. Swint is also a pretty funny guy, very relaxed!

This was a really helpful class, and one that I needed for my degree. I've taken Dr. Swint before and knew he was a really good teacher but I usually don't like online classes. It worked out pretty well though. Dr. Swint is now the head of the political science department but he still took the time to help out.

Swint is a really good professor. He's pretty interesting most days and has a low key, pretty chill approach. He's also pretty funny, which makes it easier to come to class.Take good notes and don't miss too many classes.

Easy A.  Makes some crude jokes, but as long as you aren't easily offended, this class is better than a really hard professor.  Goes mainly off outlines for tests.  Go to class most of the time and your set.
Mr. Swint is really nice and he has a way of talking about the material that makes it interesting. Three tests right out of the notes.
This is one of the best professors at KSU. He's prepared and knows his field. Fair tests and no BS.

Professor Swint is a great and fun teacher! Class is not mandatory but if you go and he gets to know who you are he will def. help you out with your grade! I don't really like american gov. but he makes it as interesting as he can! Take his class!

Teacher was kinda annoying. Lectures felt really rehearsed (and not in a good way) and he seemed really into himself. Took this class in high school but didn't take the AP exam so I already knew most of this so if you're not an absolute beginner, don't take this class. There are extra credit opportunities (3) and tests were easy (3). No final.
Dr. Swint is a very good teacher. He is pretty funny and his classes almost always hold your interest. Attendance is important, and taking good notes is also important. And he's on Twitter!

American Government is the worst class ever period point blank. Luckily Mr. Swint is a pretty good teachers his classes are just a bit boring because all he does is lecture and you have no homework or in class assignments. Class is manageable he gives a lot of extra credit and if you just study and take good notes the tests are passable.
I HATE political science, but Dr. Swint made class very interesting and I actually enjoyed learning about the discussions.  Not quite an "easy A", but very manageable and you will learn a ton!
Very accessible, knowledgeable, laidback, and clear. Provides outlines, study guides, and extra credit. Take him.

Dr. Swint is a great professor; he makes the class very interesting. He's also pretty funny--he makes it easy to pay attention. The 3 multiple-choice tests aren't very difficult if you study. Not much is from the book. Go to class, pay attention, and study notes and you will get an A.

Great professor. He is really funny and even puts some humorous answers on the tests. He is extremely knowledgable and you leave his class with a weath of knowledge. Happy to have taken his course. I would definitly recommend him as an awesome teacher!

Great class & great professor. Go to class, write good notes and study for the tests. He is very interesting and makes the subject fun. He has a really good sense of humor. He adds really funny answers on the tests and cracks alot of jokes in class. He knows the subject matter really well and you leave his class with tons of useful information.

Professor Swint is one of the best professors at KSU! He is very helpful and convey the material in a crystal clear fashion. He makes learning all about politics and media extremely interesting and fun.  I have taken 3 of his classes and enjoyed ALL of them!

Professor Swint is a great teacher, who really makes the material interesting. I took his Mass Media & Politics class, and we had three different text books, but we really utilized all of them. Not hard, test are straight from the books a PPTs. A paper, 4 tests, discussions and that's about it. He is willing to work with students and is very helpful, Highly recommend. Plus, he's kinda famous!

This professor is awesome. Laid back class and he is funny. 3 tests, no final, and there are various extra credit opportunities. Put in minimal effort and get an A! DEFF. recommend him! He makes  class enjoyable to come to.

Professor Swint's class was very enjoyable. Although he makes the class fun and interesting, I ended up with a B in the class! Thought it would be an "easy A" like said on here. YES it is possible to get an A, but even when he would share the grade distribution of test grades to the class, MOST ppl got B on all the tests. Fair, but NOT an "easy A."

Dr. Swint, is an amazing teacher!  He makes the class interesting, which in turn makes it easy to learn and understand.  3 tests, no final, extra credit opportunities, etc.  This is the POLS 1101 teacher that you WANT to take!

LOVE HIM. Great teacher, and very interesting. 3 tests.. just do the study guides and go to the review sessions and you'll get an A. Attendance isn't mandatory, but it helps if he recognizes you plus the class isn't boring and dreadful to come to.

He is the best professor I've had so far! Although lecture-based, his hilarious commentary makes class enjoyable. Very knowledgeable in his field of Political Science and does not share his own opinions unless specifically asked - even then, he is respectful.
Well, read all these comments, this guy is GREAT. really laid back, enjoyable casual class. Easy A

Swint is an excellent professor. He knows his area of expertise very well; so well that he's appeared as a guest on a few news/talk shows. He has a good sense of humor too. Tests are easy, and he offers review sessions before each one. Attendance is not mandatory, but you'll likely be motivated to go to class because sessions are very interesting.

Professor Swint is great! He makes class fun and interesting and makes you want to come. His tests are easy and perfectly reflect what he discusses in class and in his outlines, so pay attention and study and you will easily make A's! The in-class debates we have are very interesting, and he somehow makes politics interesting. Take his class!
Took this class as my first class after being out of school for years.  Great teacher, very responsive. If you have no interest in American Government take this class, it will light a spark

Swint is awesome.  He is a national expert on politics and media and he has written several books.  He's very down to earth and very helpful.  The class is organized very well and the powerpoint slides and web links are great.

Dr. Swint is one of the best teachers I have ever had.  He keeps it pretty interesting and has a good sense of humor.  His tests are not hard if you pay attention and take notes.  He also holds study sessions before each test, which really helps.

Kerwin Swint is an awesome professor. His lectures aren't the most interesting but he takes a very laid back view to things and finds the government humorous. What he tells you in class is exactly what will be on the tests. His tests aren't bad. I attended class and went to the study sessions and got a B on all of them. Enjoyable and easy class.

If you want to hear someone talk about Obama for an hour, this is the teacher to take.  VERY liberal and not afraid to say it.  Very full of himself.  Gives outlines for every lecture and study guides for the test.  Not an easy A, but if you study you will do fine.

Honestly, he is great. The class may seem boring and long because he talks the whole time, but he posts the outlines and study guides online and holds review sessions before the test. The tests are 50 multiple choice questions and the final is not accumulative. He wants his students to do well, so he is a nice and understanding person.
He is not necessarily an easy A but he does supply you with the information you need for the tests. Make sure you study and attend the review sessions

he was pretty interesting even though govt is painfully dull for me. the tests are easy if you pay attention in class and take good notes. he offers extra credit for all 3 tests. he really knows the process and material. he's always cracking really corny jokes when you least expect it. i'd take him again

He is a great instructor.  He is exciting to listen to and he knows his subject well.  He is the funniest professor i have ever had.  Easy A if you take good notes and do the work.  Study the lecture notes and read the book and you will be fine.

What a great professor! Incredibly smart and knowledgeable in politics as well as other current topics. Really knows how to keep the class entertaining and does crack a few good jokes. The second test seemed to be a lot harder than the others.

Best Teacher at KSU!!! He posts all notes on webct. Extra credit for every test. Cancels like 3-4 classes a semester! Study sessions before each test. He makes class interesting because of his witty comments. I plan on taking his POLS 3385 next semester! Take him if you know whats good for you!!!
Interesting, funny, care-free, easy if you come to class and participate.

He is very intelligent and funny a rare combonation.  If you come to class and take notes you can pass his class easily.  you need to read the chapters and study.  all of your grade is off of the three test you are given.  Some extra credit but not much.  overall very good class I recommend him.

This teacher is by far my favorite teacher here! He explains politics very clearly and provides everything that on the test in his lectures. Its not required to go to class but you want to, he makes it interesting and allows you to become more involved. Was on the View the semester i took him. Pretty cool, very laid back teacher and easy to work wi

Easy, lots of work, i wrote out definitions it helped on the test. The test are all online but scattered througout the chapter so it was tough to find the answer unless you know where to look-in the online book. Easy, understanding teacher, weekly discussions, extra credit --easy!! I'd take him again!

He posts his notes for every class. Attendance is not mandatory and his tests are pretty easy. If you do not fare well on the tests he offers several extra credit opportunities.  Mot a bad class but it can be boring at times.

Dr. Swint is a very good professor.  His classes are fun, he posts weekly outlines of lectures, and he even organizes study sessions outside of class.  Whoever wrote the post below is probably just jealous, cause professor Swint is kind of a hottie.

Don't let Swint fool you... that picture was taken ages ago. He's a real business like guy but is very laid back. You have 3 test and 1 participation grade and thats it. Teachs everything from the front the classroom and always has jokes ready to go. Another funny guy at Kennesaw State! I made a B in his class and I played tetris everyday...
good at keeping your attention.  lots of notes.  nice guy.  nice tush.

Very good instructor. Has a very good sense of humor, and does a very good job of explaining the material. You have to go to class to do good on the tests because the tests are straight from his notes, and he doesn't post them online. Just put forth a little effort studying and go to class and you should do well.
Awesome Teacher! Yet if not auditory learner then dont take this class. His tests are from his notes which he says aloud. Never opened book. Extra credit was always given. Very caring and best at KSU
Online class. Very easy. Didn't have to do anythig but read the text. Very easy to reach, even though he was in Europe the entire time. -- Online class though ;)--
very nice and understanding guy...always willing to help, grades very fair.
he makes the subject matter really fun. he'll do anything he can to help you succeed in his class if you put forth an effort.

He really knows the subject; you learn a lot. He keeps things mostly unbiased. However, he often just repeats the readings; there is often no reason to go to class other than the attendance requirement. The quizzes will ask you to remember what an author said in a certain chapter which is difficult to remember since we bounce around between books.
Great Teacher. makes the subject engaging. definately recomended
He is a very entergetic prof who will go the extra mile so you will do well in his class
Take him, period.  Great guy.  Wish every class was with him.
Cheerful demeanor, superficially friendly, but intensely devious and umderhanded--don't trust him--you will regret it--aslo anti-democratic, authoritarian attitudes!
Great teacher, funny to boot.  Knows what he's talking about.  Very objective.  Go to class, take notes and you'll do fine.
aweosme
Easy to listen to, interesting and competent
A hard core lecturer who is in love with politics. If you like the 1hr and 45min worth of lecturing, as well as impossible tests, you'll love Swint. He is a funny guy, but his teaching is dull.
Nice guy. if you have questions or need assistance he is more than happy to help.
Great teacher, take lots of notes and read the book, you'll be fine.

Currently the best teacher in the department! Easy to understand, fun, helpful, 2-3 tests depending on course and at least 1 group project. Says he has an attendance policy but doesn't really care, just a scare tactic to get you to class. Def. recommend!
No Comments
